item.title: Refactoring to Microservices
item.description: EMRIS a perfect fit for Microservices Microservices, a new old flavor of the the month?

item.title: Semantic Versioning
item.description: We should all be using Semantic Versioning: During this November I attended the PHP[WORLD] 2014 conference in Washington, D.C. To say that it was a beneficial conference would be an understatement. It seemed that valuable information was being shared at every corner. One of those gems is semantic versioning. This topic came up during a session on how to use PHP Composer by Rafael Dohms. Semantic versioning uses the familiar format xx.
